QList<double> getExoplanetsData(int mode)
{
switch(mode)
{
case 1:
return EPSemiAxisAll;
break;
case 2:
return EPMassAll;
break;
case 3:
return EPRadiusAll;
break;
case 4:
return EPPeriodAll;
break;
case 5:
return EPAngleDistanceAll;
break;
default:
return EPEccentricityAll;
}
}
